valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 6 Jan 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 7 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: New low expected northern Scotland 996 by 1800 Tuesday. Low Viking 1006 and low German Bight 1012 both losing their identity by same time. Low Biscay 1011 losing its identity by that time

Snow showers.

Good, occasionally very poor.

Biscay.text:
Wind
In north, northeast 3 to 5, backing southwest 4 to 6. In south, northerly or northwesterly 6 to gale 8, decreasing 4 to 6 later, becoming variable 2 to 4 later.

Weather
In north, rain later. In south, showers.
Visibility
In north, good, occasionally poor later. In south, good.
